name: part_006
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目誕生日2022】HappyMeowthday!!な3D配信！！ [hrpubiRwB-k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora shows off her new hairstyle and outfit, talking with A-chan who acts like a proud mother.
Tokino Sora and A-chan perform the song 'Happy Synthesizer' together.

subtitles.original: はい、皆さん。
subtitles.english: Alright, everyone.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、気合入れて髪型もね...
subtitles.english: I've put a lot of effort into my hairstyle too...

subtitles.original: ちょっと後ろも失礼しちゃっていい？
subtitles.english: Can I show you the back too?

subtitles.original: やだ素敵！
subtitles.english: Oh, wonderful!

subtitles.original: 見てみんな！可愛い、うちの子！
subtitles.english: Look everyone! So cute, my child!

subtitles.original: ママ、こっち見て！ママの方見て！
subtitles.english: Mama, look here! Look towards mama!

subtitles.original: ああ可愛い！見て！可愛い！
subtitles.english: Ah, so cute! Look! So cute!

subtitles.original: みんな、みんなの方手振ってるよ、ほら。
subtitles.english: Everyone, she's waving to you all, see.

subtitles.original: 可愛い！すごい可愛い。
subtitles.english: Cute! So very cute.

subtitles.original: あ、いいですね。
subtitles.english: Ah, looking good.

subtitles.original: 可愛い。
subtitles.english: Cute.

subtitles.original: いいね。あ、ありがとうございます、カメラさん。
subtitles.english: Nice. Ah, thank you, Mr. Cameraman.

subtitles.original: すみません、カメラ奪っちゃって。
subtitles.english: Sorry for taking over the camera.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ可愛かったね。
subtitles.english: She was so cute, wasn't she?

subtitles.original: めちゃくちゃノリノリで撮影してくれるじゃん。
subtitles.english: He's filming with so much enthusiasm.

subtitles.original: いや、可愛いなと思って。
subtitles.english: Well, I thought it was cute.

subtitles.original: ありがと。ありがとうございます、すみませんカメラさん。
subtitles.english: Thank you. Thank you, sorry Mr. Cameraman.

subtitles.original: みんな、スクショたくさん撮ってくれたかな？
subtitles.english: Did everyone take lots of screenshots?

subtitles.original: 撮った？みんな、スクショ撮り忘れてない？めっちゃ可愛かったんだから。
subtitles.english: Did you? Everyone, you didn't forget to take screenshots? She was so cute.

subtitles.original: 「うちの娘可愛い」って書かれてる。あ、うちの娘？
subtitles.english: Someone wrote "Our daughter is cute". Oh, our daughter?

subtitles.original: みんなの娘になった、もしかして？
subtitles.english: Did she become everyone's daughter, maybe?

subtitles.original: いっしょに頑張ろうね、うちらママ共として。よろしくね、頑張ろう。
subtitles.english: Let's work together as fellow mamas. Nice to meet you, let's do our best.

subtitles.original: ママがいっぱいになっちゃった。
subtitles.english: There are so many mamas now.

subtitles.original: うちらの娘、可愛いよね今日。
subtitles.english: Our daughter is cute today, isn't she?

subtitles.original: やったー、なんかこうやってね、みんなに見てもらえて私も満足しちゃったな。
subtitles.english: Yay! I'm so happy that everyone could see me like this.

subtitles.original: あ、本当に？満足しちゃった？
subtitles.english: Ah, really? You're satisfied?

subtitles.original: じゃあ帰るわ。お疲れ。
subtitles.english: Then I'm going home. Good job.

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って！お疲れ様でしたー、じゃないから！
subtitles.english: Wait a second! Don't "good job" me yet!

subtitles.original: なんだよ。
subtitles.english: What is it?

subtitles.original: 一緒に歌ってよ。
subtitles.english: Sing with me.

subtitles.original: 歌いたいの？
subtitles.english: You want to sing?

subtitles.original: 歌いたいよ。最初からそう言いなさいよ。
subtitles.english: I want to sing. You should have said so from the start.

subtitles.original: いや、めっちゃ緊張するんだけど。
subtitles.english: No, I'm really nervous.

subtitles.original: ちょっと裏話してもいい？
subtitles.english: Can I share a little behind-the-scenes story?

subtitles.original: 今から歌う曲、ちょっと踊りがあるんですよ。
subtitles.english: The song we're about to sing has a bit of dancing.

subtitles.original: あのね、ずっと横でこうやって練習してんの。
subtitles.english: You know, she's been practicing like this right next to me the whole time.

subtitles.original: もう必死なんだ。
subtitles.english: I'm desperate.

subtitles.original: 全然、全然わかんない。
subtitles.english: I don't get it at all.

subtitles.original: ずっとこうやってんの、ずっと。だからね、ナンチに教えてもらったんだっけ、数箇所。
subtitles.english: She kept doing this, constantly. So, didn't Nanchi teach you a few parts?

subtitles.original: そう、だからなんか、それ見てあげて。頑張っている娘をうちらで見よう。
subtitles.english: Yes, so please watch that. Let's watch our daughter doing her best together.

subtitles.original: 絶対間違える、怖い。
subtitles.english: I'm definitely going to mess up, I'm scared.

subtitles.original: いや、大丈夫やって。参観日の気持ちでうちら来てるからさ。
subtitles.english: No, it'll be fine. We're here with the feeling of a parent at a school visitation.

subtitles.original: どういうこと？めっちゃ関西弁になったわ。
subtitles.english: What do you mean? I've suddenly gone full Kansai-ben.

subtitles.original: そう、参観日の気持ちで来てるから、みんなもその気持ちで見守ってやって。
subtitles.english: Right, I'm here like it's a school visitation, so everyone, please watch over her with that same feeling.

subtitles.original: 私たまにチラチラ見ちゃうかも。
subtitles.english: I might peek over at you occasionally.

subtitles.original: いいよ全然。見ていいから、みんなパパとママにしてあげてや。
subtitles.english: That's totally fine. You can look, and everyone, let's be her papas and mamas.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫やって、心配性やねんめっちゃ。
subtitles.english: It'll be fine, you're just such a worrier.

subtitles.original: ねー。でも緊張してるけど。まあ歌は大丈夫だと思うんだけど。
subtitles.english: Yeah. I'm nervous, though. Well, I think the singing will be okay.

subtitles.original: まあダンスがぐちゃぐちゃになったらごめん。
subtitles.english: But if the dancing gets all messy, I'm sorry.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、うちも忘れるとこあるし。
subtitles.english: It's okay, I have parts I forget too.

subtitles.original: あ、ほんと？
subtitles.english: Oh, really?

subtitles.original: あ、大丈夫、大丈夫。
subtitles.english: Ah, it's fine, it's fine.

subtitles.original: 可愛ければ許してくれるから。
subtitles.english: If you're cute, they'll forgive you.

subtitles.original: あ、もうダメやなと思ったら、こうやっておけば大丈夫や。
subtitles.english: If you think "Oh, I'm failing," just do this and it'll be fine.

subtitles.original: 頑張り、頑張ります。
subtitles.english: I'll do... I'll do my best.

subtitles.original: 頑張る？オッケー。頑張るって、みんな応援してあげてな。
subtitles.english: You'll do your best? Okay. She says she'll do her best, so everyone, please cheer for her.

subtitles.original: はい、はい。じゃあ一緒に言おうね。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes. Well then, let's say it together.

subtitles.original: せーの！ハッピーシンセサイザ！
subtitles.english: One, two! Happy Synthesizer!

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ 君の胸の奥まで 届くようなメロディ 奏でるよ
subtitles.english: Happy synthesizer, I'll play a melody that will reach the depths of your heart.

subtitles.original: 儚く散った淡い片思い
subtitles.english: That fleeting, faint unrequited love...

subtitles.original: 笑い話だね今となれば
subtitles.english: It's just a funny story now.

subtitles.original: 見るものすべて輝いて見えた
subtitles.english: Everything I saw seemed to sparkle;

subtitles.original: あの日々が綺麗に笑ってるよ
subtitles.english: Those days are smiling beautifully now.

subtitles.original: 我慢することだけ覚えなきゃいけないの？
subtitles.english: Do I only have to learn how to endure?

subtitles.original: 大人になって頂戴ねならなくていいよ
subtitles.english: "Please grow up"... I don't want to.

subtitles.original: 知らないことばかり知らないなんて言えなくて
subtitles.english: Only things I don't know, yet I couldn't say I didn't know.

subtitles.original: 大変お似合いで嘘ついてごめんね
subtitles.english: "It suits you perfectly"... sorry for lying.

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ 君の胸の奥まで 届くようなメロディ 奏でるよ
subtitles.english: Happy synthesizer, I'll play a melody that will reach the depths of your heart.

subtitles.original: つまらない建前やヤなこと全部 消してあげるからこの音で
subtitles.english: Boring pretenses and all the unpleasant things... I'll erase them for you with this sound.

subtitles.original: 何のとりえもない僕にただひとつ
subtitles.english: There's only one thing I can do,

subtitles.original: 少しくだけでできること
subtitles.english: Even though I have no special talents.

subtitles.original: 心躍らせる飾らない言葉
subtitles.english: Simple words that make your heart dance,

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll convey them through electronic sounds.

subtitles.original: 好きになること理屈なんかじゃなくて
subtitles.english: Falling in love isn't about logic;

subtitles.original: 落ち着けなんていらないんじゃない
subtitles.english: Maybe "calm down" isn't necessary.

subtitles.original: 時代のせいと諦めたらそこまで
subtitles.english: If you give up and blame the times, that's the end.

subtitles.original: 踏み出さなくちゃ何も始まらない
subtitles.english: You have to take a step, or nothing will start.

subtitles.original: ごめんね夜遅く寝てたところだったでしょ？
subtitles.english: Sorry it's late, were you sleeping?

subtitles.original: 驚いた私も駆け出そうとしてた
subtitles.english: Surprised, I was about to run out too.

subtitles.original: 心の裏側をくすぐられているような
subtitles.english: Like having the back of my heart tickled...

subtitles.original: 惹かれあう二人に幸せな音を
subtitles.english: A happy sound for two people drawn to each other.

subtitles.original: ハッピーシンセサイザ ほら楽しくなるよ 涙拭うメロディ 奏でるよ
subtitles.english: Happy synthesizer, look, it's getting fun! I'll play a melody that wipes away tears.

subtitles.original: 強がらなくたっていいんじゃない別に
subtitles.english: You don't have to act tough;

subtitles.original: 自分に正直になればいい
subtitles.english: It's okay to just be honest with yourself.

subtitles.original: 何のとりえもない僕にただひとつ
subtitles.english: There's only one thing I can do,

subtitles.original: 少しだけできること
subtitles.english: Even though I have no special talents.

subtitles.original: ちょっと照れるような単純な気持ち
subtitles.english: Simple feelings that are a bit embarrassing,

subtitles.original: 電子音で伝えるよ
subtitles.english: I'll convey them through electronic sounds.
